member.name: P:Campaign.Length
member.summary: Gets the number of levels in the campaign by returning the length of the levels array.

member.name: F:Campaign.header
member.summary: Contains additional campaign metadata. Marked with [XmlIgnore] attribute, indicating it's not included in XML serialization. The header.name is preferred over the name field for display purposes when available.

member.name: F:Campaign.name
member.summary: The name of the campaign. This field is used during serialization/deserialization to persist the campaign name, and as a fallback display name in ToString() when the header.name is not available.

member.name: F:Campaign.brodownLevel
member.summary: Specifies which level index to use for Brodown game mode within this campaign. A value of -1 indicates the default Brodown level should be used. When set to a valid level index (0 to Length-1), that specific level will be loaded when entering Brodown mode.

member.name: F:Campaign.levels
member.summary: Array containing all the level data (MapData objects) that make up this campaign. Each MapData represents a single level with its terrain, enemies, and objectives. Initialized to an empty array by default.

member.name: M:Campaign.Deserialize(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Deserializes campaign data from a binary stream when loading. Reads the campaign name (handling null values), brodownLevel index, level count, then creates and deserializes each level's MapData.
member.param: The BinaryReader to read the serialized data from

member.name: M:Campaign.Serialize(System.IO.BinaryWriter)
member.summary: Serializes the campaign data to a binary stream for saving. Writes the campaign name (handling null values), brodownLevel index, level count, and then serializes each level's MapData.
member.param: The BinaryWriter to write the serialized data to

member.name: M:Campaign.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the campaign. If a header exists, uses header.name; otherwise uses the name field. Includes the total number of levels in the format "Campaign: [name]. levels: [count]".
member.returns: A formatted string describing the campaign name and level count
